job.title: Java Software Engineer
job.description: stronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongImportant Note During the application process ensure your contact information email and phone number is up to date and upload your current resume when submitting your application for consideration To participate in some selection activities you will need to respond to an invitation The invitation can be sent by both email and text message In order to receive text message invitations your profile must include a mobile phone number designated as Personal Cell or Cellular in the contact information of your applicationbrbrAt Wells Fargo we are looking for talented people who will put our customers at the center of everything we do We are seeking candidates who embrace diversity equity and inclusion in a workplace where everyone feels valued and inspiredbrbrHelp us build a better Wells Fargo It all begins with outstanding talent It all begins with youbrbrTechnology sets IT strategy enhances the design development and operations of our systems optimizes the Wells Fargo infrastructure provides information security and enables Wells Fargo global customers to have 24 hours a day 7 days a week banking access through inbranch online ATMs and other channelsbrbrOur mission is to deliver stable secure scalable and innovative services at speeds that delight and satisfy our customers and unleash the skills potential of our employeesbrbrConsumer Lending TechnologybrbrThe Consumer Lending Technology CLT group executes the Wells Fargo Technology strategy and offers a strategic technology perspective to the lines of business LOBs we support These LOBs include Auto Card Retail amp Merchant Services Home Lending and Personal Loans within Consumer Lending Our teams provide technology solutions to the LOBs and manage the application portfolios through the enablers of skills stability security scalability speed and satisfactionbrbrWe have an excellent opportunity for an experienced Full Stack Engineer on our team where the greatest minds in software engineering help to shape the architecture develop and transform the next generation Home Lending Fulfillment platformbrbrIn this role you will automate complex home lending business processes by leveraging cutting edge Microservices technologies event streaming related tools UI frameworks This is an opportunity for an experienced engineer to really land their footprint and produce immediate impact by leveraging your strengths and past experience while learning new things Youll bring experience in taking your ideas from concept to customer at scale with high quality and on time Youll thrive on highgrowth highimpact opportunities within this teambrbrstronguRequired Qualificationsbrustrongulli5 years of software engineering experiencelili5 years of Java experiencelili5 years of Spring experiencelili2 years of Agile experiencebrliulstronguDesired QualificationsbrustrongulliAn industrystandard technology certificationliliStrong verbal written
